jd: Hi, Greeting from Magic Force…!!! My name is Vasu we have a job opportunity for GCP Data Engineer based Remote please find the job description below, if you are available and interested, please send us your word copy of resume with following details to vasu@magicforce.us to discuss more about this position. Job Title: GCP Data Engineer Location: Remote Duration: 1+ Year Start Date: ASAP Mandatory Skills: Python, SQL, GCP, Pyspark. Job Description: 12+ Years of experience • Must have years of experience GCP Services including Big Query, Data flow, Data proc, Apache Beam, Pub Sub, Composer, Airflow • Building a brand-new internal app for accuracy dept • SQL strong • Database modelling skills • Data movement from different data sources • Demonstrate technical and creative skills • Data storage • Design of data environment • Python • Google cloud platform experience preferred • Cloud platform experience preferred • Cloud architecture and development preferred • R-shiny skills preferred If you are interested in this position, kindly fill the details and revert back me with Any ID Proof Copy. Full Name Work Authorization and validity Present location (Full Address Zip Code) Contact Number Passport Number E-mail Address DOB LinkedIn ID Last 4 digits of SSN Currently on the project (Yes / No) Availability to join the project Availability for onsite / remote Overall, USA IT experience Year’s Overall relevant IT experience Year’s Bill rate$/hr all-inclusive on Year of arrival in USA and the employer’s name Education Detail’s Bachelor’s and Master’s (University/Stream/Year of passing)
